title: Chat Web App
description: A full-stack real-time chat application with authentication, image sharing, and instant messaging powered by WebSockets.

title: Medihome
description: A healthcare platform that allows patients to book doctor, while admins and doctors can manage schedules and records.

title: Quik Cart
description: A full-stack eCommerce web app with authentication, product management, and cloud integration.

title: Weather App
description: Displays live weather updates with a clean, responsive UI.

title: Wanderlust
description: A travel web app for exploring and managing travel destinations, featuring authentication and interactive maps.

title: Indore Plants
description: A simple project built to practice styling and layouts using Tailwind CSS.

title: The Burgers
description: A front-end project focused on creating a modern and responsive UI for a food-themed app.

title: Nike Shoes
description: A modern landing page showcasing Nike shoes, built with only HTML and CSS to practice responsive design and clean layouts.
